message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $13500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $12500. Can we consider that?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to my previous offer. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $13000.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $12750. Can we consider that?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $13200.
I understand that you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $12900. Can we consider that?
I'm not willing to go below $13000, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $13100.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $12800. This is my final offer. If you can meet me here, I'm willing to make a deal.
